resources.string: Beginners should begin at the easy level - where you will have to deal with finding the number in just 5 seconds

Those who have achieved the easy level â€“ the next challenge is the mediocre level, there we challenge you with more numbers, but harder this time don\'t you worry cause you are a champions. At this point in just 4 seconds you will have to find the lost number

"Run from here to the next level - the hardest of all but the last. Other numbers, quick and swift that run in front of you. Just 3 seconds - that's all you get and all is left is run and play. Good Luck! "
And if you\'ve found 10 numbers here, you\'ll listen it\'s really amazing!
And after you find 10 numbers at the right time, you should go to the advanced level
The game that will make you think quickly, look for the numbers and most importantly - that there will be no confusion. 3 disqualifications, dozens of numbers So go ahead - run to read the rules
